text: The owner is so responsive and able to assist to help me repair my wheelchair as my father needs to use it urgently. Strongly recommend his service. Swift and efficient.

The service at this shop is very good, they even answered my enquires at late night hours and arrange the wheelchair at earliest time. Price is very reasonable and I would like to thank Kim for the great services and I will definitely recommend this shop to my friend who has needs in the future.

Very helpful guy, even answered and attended to my needs late night after 10pm. Offered me a temporary wheelchair while mine is been repaired. Even took all the trouble to go to his shop to look for the replacement parts as I told him I needed it urgently. Pricing is very cheap and affordable.
Eventually I didn‚Äôt engage his service as my brother took the wheelchair and got it repaired on his own.
I felt bad as he went through so much trouble just to try to get my wheelchair repaired by today so I tried to offer him a little token of appreciation but was refused by him.
He told me ‚Äúit‚Äôs ok, no worries‚Äù
Very nice and a true gentleman. üëç

Mr Kim came to our rescue!
My mum was visiting Singapore for a holiday, but arrived just before the Lunar New Year and we hadn‚Äôt arranged a wheelchair to rent. Mr Kim kindly arranged to deliver the wheelchair to our home so we had it as soon as my mum arrived. She was so pleased as we were able to show her so much of Singapore, which is very wheelchair friendly. If it had not been for Mr Kim, we probably wouldn‚Äôt have been able to get a wheelchair until almost a week later, so he saved her holiday.
Mr Kim always communicated promptly and clearly and was an absolute pleasure to deal with. We just can‚Äôt recommend him highly enough. And if that were not enough, his rates are very fair too.
Thank you so much Mr Kim for making my mum‚Äôs holiday perfect.

I need to change the foot rest and the arm rest of my mom's wheelchair„ÄÇHe came to my home the next day to change. The price is very  reasonable, service is professional, the parts changed although is used but is in good condition, I am very happy with the overall service, I strongly recommend  Nambao for those who wants to repair their wheelchair . Well done! Keep it up!  Thanks for repairing my wheelchair , it can take up a new assignment for me now.
